Row.Text: All religious units receive the Cult of Kek ability, which provides +10 Religious Strength. [ICON_FAITH] Faith output of cities increased by 25%, with an additional 100% bonus upon researching Computers. [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output of Great Works of Art, Music, and Writing increased by 15%, with an additional 25% bonus upon researching Writing.
Gold buildings and trade routes provide +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Unlocks the Border Patrol unique unit upon completing the Nationalism civic.
Focuses on gold and production, and likes civilizations who do the same. Dislikes civilizations with low gold or production.
Trump is pleased with your Gold and Production
Trump is disappointed that you have little Gold and Production
+10 [ICON_RELIGION] Religious Strength from the Cult of Kek ability.
+10 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength from fighting in home territory.
A building unique to Kekistan. Provides +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity, +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, and +4 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
Kekistani unique unit that replaces the Missionary. Cheaper to purchase than the Missionary and can spread religion 1 extra time.

Kekistani unique Industrial era unit when God-Emperor Trump is their leader that replaces the Ranger. +5 [ICON_STRENGTH] melee / ranged combat strength. Gains an additional +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength when fighting in home territory. Cheaper to build and maintain than the Ranger.
